        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game, depicting a snowy landscape with a stone pathway leading through a wooden torii gate. The main character, dressed in dark clothing and wielding a staff, is engaged in combat with an enemy who has a visible health bar. The game interface shows various icons and gauges, including a health bar and a "Will" counter with values of +4 and x13. The environment is detailed with snow-covered trees and rocks, and additional figures can be seen in the background.
